hero.title: Extend Your AI Agent
hero.subtitle: Infinite Possibilities
hero.description: OpenClaw skill marketplace provides various AI Agent extensions. One-click install, ready to use, making your intelligent assistant more powerful.

howItWorks.title: How OpenClaw Works
howItWorks.subtitle: Three steps to extend your AI Agent

step1.title: Choose Skill
step1.desc: Browse the OpenClaw marketplace and select the Agent extension you need

step2.title: One-Click Install
step2.desc: Get your License Key and activate the skill in OpenClaw settings

step3.title: Start Using
step3.desc: Your AI Agent immediately gains new capabilities and starts working efficiently

plugPlay.title: Plug & Play
plugPlay.desc: One-click install, no complex configuration needed

secure.title: Secure & Reliable
secure.desc: All skills are reviewed, data is encrypted, privacy protected

community.title: Community Driven
community.desc: Contributed by developer community, constantly updated

payAsYouGo.title: Pay As You Go
payAsYouGo.desc: Only pay for the skills you need, no subscription, no hidden fees
